txt.en: 'Are you ready?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
'I'll admit Mekhnet seems to be doing better, but she insists on re-entering Târ-kútoz with you, which I cannot abide. It was my fault that she -- '\n\nMekhnet clears her throat.
Mekhnet has something to say before Lúka can continue fretting.
Mekhnet is intent on hunting down the goblin Thraunákh.
You have returned to Ashmargathâl.\n\nLúka will want to know everything that's happened.
Mekhnet has decided to strike Atrad-zarakh with you.\n\nShe waits at Ashmargathâl.

'You're back! Of course I was worried, but that is different from harbouring doubt. I had faith that you two would return. As I have faith that we can now better handle the Orcs of Târ-kútoz.\n\n'Thank you, Hermáth. I hope we all can meet again someday, when this war will be nothing more than mere memory.'

'I made mistakes that night as well -- I wasn't careful enough. But blaming ourselves won't change the past. There isn't anything to forgive, Lúka.\n\n'Hermáth, let's pay the Orcs a visit. I've got matters to settle with a certain goblin.'
